content.content: ARC - ESU Assignment Tracker - This Dashboard tracks ESU Registration for Windows & SQL Server 2012 and tracks the distribution of SQL Server 2014
SQL Server 2012 - End of Life - 12th July 2022
SQL Server 2014 - Planned End of Life - 9th July 2024

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Query - All Arc Registered Windows 2012 Servers broken down by ESU assigned/not assigned
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
//ESU Assignment (esu eligibility - OS is ESU capable, License Assignment State - OS does/does not have ESU assigned
| extend ESU = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState)
| extend esuEligibility = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.esuEligibility)
| extend esuCount = iff(ESU == "NotAssigned",0,1)
//Change to "Windows Server 2012" for live version
| where osSku contains "Windows Server 2012" 
| summarize ServerCount = count() by ESU

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
//Change to Windows Server 2012
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| where osSku contains "Windows Server 2012"
| extend esuLicense= tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState)
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subScriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| project subScriptionName , resourceGroup, esuLicense
| summarize ServerCount = count() by subScriptionName, resourceGroup, esuLicense

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Summary Query â€“ reports a count of servers onboarded to Arc by Subscription, Resource Group, returning if ESU is activated or not
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend esuEligibility = tostring(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.esuEligibility)
//Select where Server is Eligible for ESUs
| where esuEligibility == "Eligible"
| extend ESUAttached = iff(properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState =="Assigned", 1, 0)
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| summarize percentESUAssigned = toint(
    round((todouble(sum(ESUAttached)) / count() * 100), 2)) by subscriptionName

// Change to SQL Server 2014
//SQL Server Version & Edition
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend sqlEdition = tostring(properties.edition)
| extend SQLinstance = name
| where ['version'] == "SQL Server 2014"
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subScriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| project subScriptionName , resourceGroup
| summarize instanceCount = count() by subScriptionName, resourceGroup
